title: Tax Forms
body: According to the Internal Revenue Service, the average length of time for an individual to complete (keep records for, learn, prepare, copy, assemble, and send) IRS Form $$1040$$ is $$10.53$$ hours. Let us assume that the standard deviation is two hours. Suppose we randomly sample $$36$$ taxpayers.
lesson: 7.1 The Central Limit Theorem for Sample Means (Averages)
